text:
He's the 💡✨💥🌪🌙☀️🌟 so happy I got to #mom a little more before heading back to work in nyc. So hard to be away but strawberry picking was the sweetest ending 🍓🍓

A post shared by Hilary Duff (@hilaryduff) on May 16, 2017 at 2:10am PDT
